website_summaries.verdict: Keeps beverages cool for long periods of time while providing style all day long.
pros: Made of high-quality 304 grade stainless steel
Has the ability to hold ice for up to five days
cons: Sparse reports that the bar cart may arrive with a few dings

website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for parties and other get togethers, the Trinity cart features a built-in cooler to keep drinks cool.
pros: The rolling beverage cooler is made of sturdy stainless steel and opens from the top, so it’s easy to reach in a grab a drink
It also features a bottle opener with an opening that catches the popped off caps
It holds plenty of ice, cans, and bottles making it perfect for large gatherings
cons: Draining the water is a little tedious since the unit needs to be tipped over to drain properly

website_summaries.verdict: A professional-looking beverage cooler that is made to access while standing.
pros: Beautiful stainless steel design makes this a nice addition to an outdoor kitchen or patio
Made like a cart, it is easily rolled where you need it
Extra storage on the bottom shelf is convenient
cons: Pricey and large, so it is not ideal for lots of transporting

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: We've had this for almost 2 years now and its held up really well. No rust or drain leaking. We prob use it 1-2x/month but keep ice/water in it for several days each time. ORIGINAL POST: We've had this for several months now and it has held up well. Haven't seen any rust in the drain as I was worried about from having read previous reviews. This holds several cases of cans or bottles and looks much nicer than the plastic coolers. It does wobble a little when even just partially filled and rolling it but seems sturdy enough otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy

customer_reviews.title: ZERO STARS
customer_reviews.text: I cannot imagine customers giving this cooler even one star! We are Very disappointed. The stainless steel has pulled away from the liner. and it is very unstable. We have had this cooler less than a year and it was in storage over the winter. I read reviews and take them into consideration when ordering products. I read about the wobbling legs but I’d take that over the product separating and falling apart. The price defiantly didn’t reflect the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tennis momma

customer_reviews.title: She hates pretty much everything
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it and believe me, that says something. She hates pretty much everything....including me but this cooler....it gets love.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Sapir

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality for the price. I have much better camping coolers for a third of the price, but I wanted something that looked good on my deck.The cart is shaky as hell, and the cooler doesn't hold ice for crap. And to top it off now the lid (which doesn't have anything to hold it in place to begin with) doesn't even fit right now. Bottom line if you want something impractical, but that looks good this is your guy. I gave it 2 stars (instead of 1 like I wanted) because honestly after a year of weather it does still look deceivingly good (no rust etc.).
customer_reviews.author: J. Middleton

customer_reviews.title: All the parts were identifiable and the directions were perfect! The only problem was on the last step ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was very simple to put together. All the parts were identifiable and the directions were perfect! The only problem was on the last step when I took the lid out of the styrofoam and plastic it was packed in- there was a dent in the plastic lid. One knob was not connected to the lid so that may have been the cause. But the entire unit was packaged nicely. This one error at the manufacturer was very unfortunate for me. I'm not going to return it after putting it all together. I'm just a little sad about this.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Guerrera

customer_reviews.title: I love the cooler and the way it looks
customer_reviews.text: I love the cooler and the way it looks, but having said that, when it arrived it had a large ding on the front of the cooler. It is very noticeable. Also, on one of the legs, one of the four holes where the screw goes was stripped out. I had read the reviews before ordering, and these were two things which seemed to be pretty common. Love the cooler and the way it looks, but not happy with quality control, or should I say, lack of by Trinity. Not sure I would take a chance and order another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and looks really nice!
customer_reviews.text: Our cooler arrived early! No issues with the quality and no damage. Pretty easy to assemble. Sturdy wheels. Ice seems to last for several days (we live in FL so that's a big plus!). Would have given 5 stars if legs were a bit more sturdy. You don't notice that issue until it's full and you try to move it, then the legs are a bit wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Maher

customer_reviews.title: This is a well-designed product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-designed product. The cooler was easy to assemble with a Phillips screwdriver and the provided wrench. The instructions were simple and easy to understand. Packaging was exceptional! We had a party for 20 guests and this unit met the need to keep drinks ice cold in 80 degree temperatures. We left the remaining drinks and ice outside in the container after the party and ice was still present in the cooler after 4 days.
customer_reviews.author: William B.

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing and works very well
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing and works very well. Hold ice for a long time and is very easy to move. I have seen complaints about it's sturdiness. This isn't like a rolling cooler if you move it full you have to be careful. I didn't think that needed to be explained but apparently it does. Great patio cooler would recommend it to other easily.
customer_reviews.author: The Rural Overlander

customer_reviews.title: makes our porch a little more classy!
customer_reviews.text: It's a really nice addition to our back deck, where we spend a lot of time barbecuing with friends and family. It is slightly flimsy, but we don't move it around much so that's not a very big deal. I do wish the drain were all the way on the bottom, though, because you can never get all of the water out with how it is positioned. Definitely worth getting the cover, too. We've had it for about a half a year now-- always covered when we're not using it-- and it still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Junko

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Expense
customer_reviews.text: Once I put this item together and took it for a spin at a graduation party I was overwhelmed with favorable feedback from "partygoers." Hence, my five star rating. The ice lasted 4-5 days inside the house adjacent to my kitchen countertop and cleanup was very simple.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Nice product be careful assembling
customer_reviews.text: Cooler looks very nice . Easy assembly except fo1 problem . Be careful when screwing legs into bottom of cooler . Make sure they go in straight. Once they're in crooked they won't back out. I had to force one in and it still wouldn't go in all the way. Had to make a shim from an old washer to make it flush and it's ok now. Thus 4 stars instead of 5
customer_reviews.author: Michael V Johnson

customer_reviews.title: excellent product; drinks stayed cold with ice for two days
customer_reviews.text: I really, really love this cooler. We purchased it because we just installed an outdoor kitchen and didn't want to waste the counter space on the island with a small cooler that would not be used that often. We purchased this one thinking that we could roll it around anywhere and it would hold a ton of drinks. it does hold a ton of drinks and is very portable on our patio. the drinks stayed cold with ice left for two full days in the hot, texas summer. granted it was shaded by our patio, but still I wasn't expecting the ice to say for two days.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: This cooler looks awesome, strong
customer_reviews.text: We're about 5 hours away from getting hit with a category 5 hurricane in Puerto Rico and Amazon delivered right at my doorstep, just in time to face maybe a week or two without electricity. This cooler looks awesome, strong, well insulated, like a fridge and I'm sure it will help me endure this hard time. Thanks Amazon and UPS for going the extra mile with this delivery. 👏🏼
customer_reviews.author: RGB Video

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Functionally useful item but the metal seems barely thicker than aluminum foil. Looks good but not rugged or sturdy. With careful use, it should provide lots of good service and it's a good value at the price.
customer_reviews.author: AlanBike

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Mounting for the legs were not flush to base. Wobble when tight. Didn’t trust. Ironically saw on at hotel in DC I was staying and it was leaning hard just as I predicted. I should have photographed it.
customer_reviews.author: Vince D.

customer_reviews.title: It looks really nice. I would have given this item a 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks really nice. I would have given this item a 5 star review, but the lid has a dent on it. Also, there is not an option to contact seller to solve this issue unless I ship the whole item back and right now time is an issue... get together is next weekend :(
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: happy Father!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a birthday gift for my Dad. He loves it! It's kept under the covered patio (in the shade) but he's said the ice keeps for a long time...a few days. My main reason for 4 stars vs 5 is that the lid slides...not stationary, but I guess that makes loading it easier as the entire lid can be removed. And I also called the company to see if they made a folding shelf attachment for one side...they don't. Dad's solution....buying a matching cart to set glasses on (and storage for mixers, cups, etc) while making drinks! Overall, happy Father!
customer_reviews.author: Angela K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking product.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was expensive but really liked the look. A few months after using it at parties I am very pleased with it. You do pay for something that standouts but that’s kinda the point. It’s not a bright blue plastic eye sore sitting on your porch. The cooler itself works just like any other cooler. I would recommend this if your looking something different. Took about 5 mins to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Paul OBrien

customer_reviews.title: It also looked like it had stickers on it at one point that ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this to use for events at a new High Tech Incubator in town. Used it once and now its so wobbly we had to get rid of it. We tried tightening the legs but it didnt help. It also looked like it had stickers on it at one point that had been peeled off and left discolored marks on the stainless steel. The lower shelf was also dented/bent when we received it. Such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: EmmaB

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Many good things to say about this the only bad thing is that the top is a bit flimsy. As far as the good goes...came ahead of schedule, well packaged, no dents or damages, very very easy to install, it only took me 10 minutes and I am not a handyman at all! It is pretty sturdy and doesn't look or feel cheaply made. Great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: but not the best.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be OK, but not what I was hoping for. I had another cooler before, of similar design, that was much thicker with insulation and the ice lasted much longer. Also, the unit itself was much heavier by weight. It just got old and rusty and I thought I would replace it with a stainless steel model. This one is adequate, but not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Fredrick L. C

customer_reviews.title: Great product & great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually write product reviews but in this case I decided to do it. I am very satisfied with this product and the quality is extremely good. Additionally, something I want to highlight is the company behind the product. Their level customer service and response was amazing. initially we received a wrong item and they quickly resolved the problem and didn’t wait for me to returned the item to solve the situation. A GREAT VUSTOMER CENTRIC company 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Luis Di Lauro

customer_reviews.title: Both the best and the cheapest--a great value
customer_reviews.text: This cooler has very solid construction, a good finish, well insulated. As far as I see, this is the best value. I use it indoors, but if I were using it outdoors, I would get the.
customer_reviews.author: John McGehee

customer_reviews.title: Buy plenty of ice - melts fast
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in ability of cooler to hold ice. Works well for a party that lasts for a couple of hours, but not all day. Great product if you want to turn ice into water. But overall this cooler is typical of what is on market. AFTER USING FOR A YEAR WISH I COULD RETURN. WILL NOT KEEP ICE. YOU MIGHT BE BETTER OFF WITH A 5 GALLON BUCKET
customer_reviews.author: Bob K.

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t expect this to be your, “forever cooler”. I was hoping to find a really nice cooler but this is what I got for about $120. It doesn’t look bad but it is constructed to meet a price-point and be just good enough. It is not particularly sturdy but it will probably do the job for a few years. If that’s what you need, that’s what you get here.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble First use: 12 bottles of Strongbow and 16 -15 oz cans of guinness with a 22 lb bag of ice, room for plenty more but I had other coolers out, no issues rolling on a tiled floor ~50% ice was still present after 24 hrs, completely melted at 48 hrs but the water was still cool to the touch. Hoping it lasts years...
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for a large family party, with a view to using it many more times in the future. It was easy to build and very sturdy. It was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Works well as a dry bar cooler
customer_reviews.text: I use this cooler in my dry bar. It holds plenty of cans and bottles of drinks and insulates the ice fairly well. If it is being used over a weekend, I have to start with 15 pounds of ice and add a 10# bag of ice each day. However, on Monday morning the cooler is easily wheeled to the edge of the patio so the melted ice may be repurposed at the base of patio tree.
customer_reviews.author: Building a House

customer_reviews.title: Very substantial!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cooler as a gift to my son and he loves it. It's stationed near his pool and is a handsome, well-made addition to his pool oasis - plus it's a great way to keep the kids from running in the house every ten minutes for a cool drink.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly

customer_reviews.title: Had a large group of people staying with me for several days and this cooler easily kept beverages cold for the duration of thei
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to purchase a cooler and chose this one over a name brand. Had a large group of people staying with me for several days and this cooler easily kept beverages cold for the duration of their stay. Very easy to move around and the brakes on the wheels holds it in place. It. Was easy to put together. My cousin who was one of my guests liked it so much she ordered one while at my Home.
customer_reviews.author: Roseann C.

customer_reviews.title: Very functional and performs excellently.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for house parties. Keep beverages cool for a long time, cutting my ice consumption by 50%. One of my guests for Thanksgiving loved it and she purchase the same one next week for her Christmas party.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best standing cooler
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this twice. Easy to build and great for parties. Like that we are able to drain it so easy and the built in bottle opener
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Recipient loved it. Attractive stainless steel with can opener
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. Recipient loved it. Attractive stainless steel with can opener, bottle top catcher and easy drain.
customer_reviews.author: Rufus and Rasha

customer_reviews.title: Looks much better than what we were using
customer_reviews.text: Just what we need for our nursing home. Looks much better than what we were using. I wish the cooler would be able to remove to make washing much easier
customer_reviews.author: Scott Petrovich

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for daughter and family at Christmas. It arrived at my house in perfect condition...no damage inside or out. They had a Super Bowl party and set it up in the kitchen area. No leaks as some reviewers had commented. They loved it! Easy to assemble. Loved the shelf below. They honored the hint from many reviewers not to tighten the drain assembly and they had no problems. They like to party and I am sure it will be used for many years. It
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: This is good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is good quality for the money. Easy to put together, bottom shelf did come with 2 small dents in metal but I was able to bend them back and it looks good. Looks nice and seems sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Wardell

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product!! Hated that it came dented! Not worth it to pack it all back up and replace.
customer_reviews.author: bears808

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made legs not steady at all
customer_reviews.text: Legs are not steadily their sald it suppose to be 5% damage it has 6 dents the bottom shelf is very badly damage dents does not fit I will not order from Amazon for a long time . We were having a party the next day so my husband had to put it together for the party very disappointed left shelf off no hardware for shelf. Laura Marino
customer_reviews.author: Laura M.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold ice for the"price"
customer_reviews.text: The cooler is fine for a party. My only issue is that it does not keep ice for very long. In fact if the rating was how long it keeps ice I would give it a one. The other issue is the drain plug design does not drain all of the water from the melted ice. U have to pick up the cooler and tilt it to get all of the water drained. If u want this cooler for than a one night event don't buy it. If u want it for a place to hold cold drinks during a event of a few hours u will like it. Beyond that the construction is good.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: Only used this 2 times. Bought this for a Christmas gift and after using it 2 weekends this it is breaking away and you can see the yellow insulation. Trying to get a refund to buy a different make.
customer_reviews.author: sabina doyle

customer_reviews.title: The cooler appears sturdy and looks like a good stainless steel case
customer_reviews.text: Product shipped damaged. The cooler appears sturdy but shipped damaged. After assembling, I realized that there were dents on the bottom and side of the stainless steel enclosure. How disappointing because it looks like a nice cooler and looking forward to enjoying it this summer.
customer_reviews.author: FitzLens

customer_reviews.title: It arrived on July 2nd which was really great, however
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this so that it would arrive in time for our 4th of July party. It arrived on July 2nd which was really great, however, the ice box arrived with dents in it. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and looks fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly, very easy to assemble (took about 25 minutes), clear, easy-to-follow instructions, came undamaged and looks great! Very pleased with this cooler. One year later edit: I've had this cooler on my patio for a year now and it still looks just as great as it did when I unboxed it and always holds more than enough drinks for parties, keeping ice unmelted for days.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Carr

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking party cooler
customer_reviews.text: Like it a lot, looks great but during shipping the box was damage and when I opened it had a small dents on the stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: jaime o peralta

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your beverages cold for 2+ days.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a backyard BBQ or an outing with family.
customer_reviews.author: Battle/Wilson Family

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! So easy to put together and came in ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! So easy to put together and came in perfect condition. Took 15 minutes to assemble. Get the cover to keep it looking good if you plan on storing it outside
customer_reviews.author: ms

customer_reviews.title: Dual Doors Make It Flexible
customer_reviews.text: We love this cooler. The two sides accessed by separate doors make it perfect for beverage segregation. We put water bottles on one side and beer on the other. It's perfect for a party of 20+ people. We keep it stored on our patio next to a built in beverage table. Very convenient and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Clark

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this cooler
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this cooler. We purchased two and use them indoors for parties. So much classier than our other plastic coolers and much easier than constantly refilling beverage tubs. Ice stay frozen for about 24 hours so no need to continuously drain and refill ice during parties. We got a ton of compliments. Love the towel bar and attached opener too.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Missing screws
customer_reviews.text: It looks really nice but is missing 8 screws! So now I have to go buy screws to finish putting it together! Are you kidding me?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: our was perfect and easy to put together recomend
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my husbands birthday ,and he loves it ,I read the reviews before buying it ,and many complained of finding denth on it , our was perfect and easy to put together recomend it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Only problem is the dripping at the drain spot. As tight as I turn it, it still drips slowly. It would be nice if it drained all the way without having to tip it to the corner where the drain is too. However, it keeps the contents cold for a long time. Ice in it lasts for a couple of days. Seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Williamsons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a good buy for the money! Assembly was easy and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: MRS. Ski

customer_reviews.title: everything fit together easily and it looks pretty solid.  Rust Free after a full summer.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived undamaged, everything fit together easily and it looks pretty solid. So far so good, I'll revisit the review if it does not hold up over time. ** update: after a full summer of being on my patio, zero rust unlike others I have tried in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and good quality
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and keeps ice for well over 24 hours if kept closed. We ended up using it to store ice after a hurricane and were able to keep items cold for two days without adding more ice.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! I use it for my business everyday ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! I use it for my business everyday and roll it hundreds of feet to my kiosk inside of a mall and it has held up extremely well... it has been 4 months since purchase with everyday use and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made. Just bought it a few months ago and it's about done. Wish I wouldnt have bought it
customer_reviews.author: Andy Faler

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious and easy to move. LOve it!!!
customer_reviews.text: The material is good so far. We use it and has lots of spaces for drinks :)
customer_reviews.author: Yeuxvert80

customer_reviews.title: 3 years later and a wheel fell off
customer_reviews.text: Three years later and a wheel fell off- impossible to fix. Not used too much- so very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: JMSan

customer_reviews.title: Great for cookouts
customer_reviews.text: Great for cookouts!!!!!!!! Worked very well. No leaks and in 80 degree weather the ice was still pretty frozen the next morning after the party.
customer_reviews.author: Honest reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Very awesome ice chest cooler and the shelf is wonderful a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very awesome ice chest cooler and the shelf is wonderful a it can hold other items. Easy to move and push.
customer_reviews.author: gall

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a red coca cola cooler but the reviews were all just ok, so I purchased this one and spray-painted it red. It came out awesome! Very sturdy. Like some other reviewers said, the knobs on this cooler stink! but the rest is great. Just go to the hardware store and buy new knobs and screws. I know its a pain but it is well worth the effort. I have been rolling this thing across my paver patio and it feels quite sturdy. Careful installing the opener, some screws stripped on tightening.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkico

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as I thought it would be. Not as solid heavy. It's easy my for son to pull over if trying to open it.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking cooler
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband's birthday. It shipped on time and undamaged. I put together myself in under 30 minutes. It's very nice looking and is good quality. He was very happy with it and we've gotten a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleInVegas

customer_reviews.title: as he said one of best gifts
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly... my husband saw this at a neighbors party... kept talking about it, but didn't think we would use it.... birthday surprise for him!!...and a gift we have used repeatedly over the warm weather months....as he said one of best gifts ever
customer_reviews.author: Wc

customer_reviews.title: This serves great as a hot tub beverage holder
customer_reviews.text: This serves great as a hot tub beverage holder. Complete functionality. Only gave 4 starts due to the price being a little high. Having said that, I would buy it again if I had to do it over.
customer_reviews.author: Bartman

customer_reviews.title: Handsome and functional
customer_reviews.text: ...splendid addition to a lake party. Folks like the look, so they'll utilize it.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfgirl

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $150
customer_reviews.text: Owned for 5 months. Seams are coming apart on the outside (It is covered when not in use), Rust bleeding into the cooler. Legs, wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: very handy cooler
customer_reviews.text: We got this for a function out on our company's deck. It was great in that it held a lot of beer and soda and kept it cool. I removed a star because the top was not at all as described--not copper or copper look. It's black flecked metal. That's ok, but just not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: MLou365

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, good quality, keeps items cool for a long time!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps items cool for days! Looks awesome on our back patio and the shelf below is perfect for storing extra drinks. Easy to assemble, way better quality than I was expecting. We had a party last night and there's still unmelted ice in it at noon the next day. Several of our guests are going to order one for themselves!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor cooler
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor cooler. Only thing I would change is the drain plug. It protrudes out on the back side and will gouge the wall if not careful. I would move this to a handle side or underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Very nice piece for outdoor entertaining. Looks great. Not too challenging to put together. Holds a lot of drinks and the bottom tray is a nice to have. Received a lot of compliments on it. One little mark on it when it arrived but other than that no issues with it being damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: looks nice. good quality
customer_reviews.text: looks nice. good quality. i left drinks and ice in it for 2 days and ice was still in there and the drinks were still cold. I was amazed lol
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Really cool!
customer_reviews.text: Assembled in no time at all. Need to get a flat metric wrench to finish tightening the wheels to the base, but everything is solid. The top knobs are a little chintzy compared to everything else, but not worth replacing to me. I bought a coke bottle opener and cap catcher, but the catcher has horizontal slots, and the cooler has vertical pins.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wills

customer_reviews.title: the materials are high quality and it was very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: First, the materials are high quality and it was very easy to assemble. It looks really good and to my surprise, it keeps ice really well. It's not a Yeti but I put two 10 lbs of ice and beers in it last Sunday on the patio (it has been in the low 90's) and there was still some ice in it on Wednesday. Pretty impressive and I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: Great looking product
customer_reviews.text: Not only does this look good it kept drinks and ice cold for more than two days..
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Want to impress guests? Get this!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I bought this. Looks amazing, works perfect. Very happy. So many compliments. Want to impress guests? Buy this for your next party!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Lefrancois

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler.
customer_reviews.text: Well made cooler. I assembled it in about a half hour. Everything went together and fit well. Arrived in pristine condition.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fits a pot of bottles or cans. Perfect for outdoor entertaining!
customer_reviews.author: carol r

customer_reviews.title: Fine in the shade
customer_reviews.text: Needs two large bags of ice to keep cold, and probably should be on the shade. Once we moved it to the shade, there was ice in it for three days. It's very attractive tho. Would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Riddlebarger

customer_reviews.title: greatest cooler ever
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, greatest cooler ever! This cooler with keep ice for over 2 days. I wish they made a version without the stand. I might even buy a second one and not put the legs on.
customer_reviews.author: Juiciest

customer_reviews.title: it's good quality and you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was a breeze and the cooler is on point! Used it for a party and had it outside in 95 degree weather. Granted it was under a patio but it held the ice (of course there was melting) well for two days! Buy this, it's good quality and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M Sklar

customer_reviews.title: Pretty mutual at this point
customer_reviews.text: Pretty mutual at this point...I didn't receive instructions....wasn't all that difficult...the part they don't show you in pictures is that for some odd reason the drain is in the front...that part alone would stop me from reord
customer_reviews.author: David Aguiar

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, very sturdy and nice looking. Exactly as described. Would buy again. nothing more to say.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. A little wobbly when fully loaded with ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. A little wobbly when fully loaded with ice and beverages. Insulation is not that good if used outdoors, even if shaded.
customer_reviews.author: Westie

customer_reviews.title: I felt that more of it (little stuff like bottle opener & catch & drain plugs
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted this and loves it. It came in a lot of pieces. I felt that more of it (little stuff like bottle opener & catch & drain plugs, could have and should have been pre assembled but in the end. He likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described. There were no flaws. It was easy to assemble. (20 mins by myself). It kept ice for 48 hours in 95 degree weather. I love it! The drain initially leaked but I tightened it only slightly, and all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Moore

customer_reviews.title: Kept the drinks cold until the next day!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this cooler 2 days before our huge Epiphany Party, and we were not disappointed! Easy assembly, and the drinks stayed cold, with easy access and no bending over! Thank you, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool Cooler!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing!!!! Very well built. Sturdy. Use it almost daily. Not sure about the black lid though. .... seems like a light colored lid would reflect heat.
customer_reviews.author: av8r

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooler!
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is fabulous. It looks great, holds enough beverages for a large crowd, and is well insulated. It was so easy to put together. The first time we used it for a party, we received many compliments. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Josi

customer_reviews.title: great product.
customer_reviews.text: great product .. awesome appeal. easy to put together & everyone loved it . has a lot of space
customer_reviews.author: ashley s.

customer_reviews.title: No Damage
customer_reviews.text: This ice chest looks great on my patio. It was a snap to assemble and there were NO FLAWS in the finish.
customer_reviews.author: Curt M.

customer_reviews.title: Dented
customer_reviews.text: Would have been 4-5 star but.... The cooler is priced right and is as advertised, but the cooler has dents in two places. This is consistent with a few other reviews. I didn't notice them until I had assembled the cooler, so taking it back apart and shipping for a return isn't something I'm interested in doing. Especially considering the high probability the next cooler also has dents. I feel like I should receive a credit of some sort for future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: The cooler looks great! It rolls just a nice with a cooler full of drinks as it does empty. For the money you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this cooler 4 times, and it is already falling apart. The legs of the cooler slant when moving the cooler, making it totally useless. It also leaks easily. Just noticed I cannot return it either, so I've wasted $180.
customer_reviews.author: christopher s capp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Had a party, the temps were 108 degrees and 24 hrs later there was still ice, cold wine and beer!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Very functional. Great for parties. I like the locking wheels so it doesn't roll around. Easy to drain. Looks good. Several people commented on how nice it looks.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bollman

customer_reviews.title: I love this! Bought this to replace a stainless steel ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Bought this to replace a stainless steel model that we had for about 7 years. This is so nicer as the finish on the top,shelf and legs are a speckle finish over the stainless steel--much more weather resistant....
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: So far so good except the bottom shelf arrived with a dent
customer_reviews.text: So far so good except the bottom shelf arrived with a dent. It held up for one party. I will see how it holds up further.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Morningstar

customer_reviews.title: Great style
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for your deck or dock. Use it at the pool or in your backyard, cant go wrong
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: TRINITY TXK-0802 Stainless Steel Cooler with Shelf
product_meta.description: Entertain in style with an 80 quarts/20 gallons/96 aluminum can capacity. This sleek stainless steel cooler/ice cart is especially convenient with its raised design and wheels, as well as with the bottle opener and cap catcher. The bottom shelf also provides extra storage space allowing easy refills, or anything else that needs to be carted outside.
feature_bullets: High quality 304 grade Stainless Steel with sleek dark bronze speckled finish on the Lid, Shelf and Legs
3" x 1" casters for easy mobility (2 locking, 2 non-locking)
Attached bottle opener and cap catcher and drainage plug for easy care
Bottom shelf for additional storage and two-sided easy access lid. Assembly time: 15 - 30 Minutes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars568 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
